hooks.command: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path project_agents\logger | Out-Null; $cmd = $env:TOOL_INPUT_COMMAND; $desc = $env:TOOL_INPUT_DESCRIPTION; if (-not $desc) { $desc = 'No description' }; Add-Content -Path project_agents\logger\bash-command-log.txt -Value \"$(Get-Date -Format 'o') | $cmd - $desc\""
